description: Update a project material type quality control requirement.
permissions: User must be authorized to update requirements for the related project material type; access is delegated to the ProjectMaterialType policy via the project_material_type relationship.
side_effects: Updates a project material type quality control requirement record.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument. At least one field must be specified for update. If provided, --quality-control-classification cannot be empty. Project material type relationship is create-only and cannot be changed after creation. Quality control classification must be unique per project material type and must have the same broker as the project material type.
